titles.title: Congratulating Jason Kamras for his exceptional dedication to the students of John Philip Sousa Middle School in Washington, D.C., resulting in his selection as National Teacher of the Year, 2005-2006, in recognition of his work.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 3/28/2006--Introduced. Congratulates Jason Kamras for his selection as National Teacher of the Year and the Principal of his school, William Lipscomb of the John Philip Sousa Middle School in Washington, D.C., for encouraging innovative teaching. Thanks the principals and teachers at District of Columbia schools for their dedication to the city's children.
